In comparison to the original Nintendo Switch, the Switch Lite is 30% lighter, and also takes up less space, making it more convenient to travel with.

The Switch Lite also boasts a better battery performance than the Switch, rated as being between 3-7 hours, whereas the original lasts for just 2.5 - 6.5 hours.
